# F1

Formula 1 is an open-wheel racing series often called the pinnacle of Motorsport where teams battle for the World Constructor's Championship and drivers fight for the World Driver's Championship. The teams at the top usually have a lot of funding but it seems like whenever there is rain, the playing field becomes level and anyone can win or at least the lower teams can score a podium or two. In this report I will try to answer the question: **Is Rain Really The Great Equalizer in F1?**
